About

Who I am

I am a self-taught Web Developer from Romania. The past 10 years I have worked in an industry I did not really like and had a job I started to hate because I did not enjoy what I was doing each day at work and believe its important to like what you do at work and not just do it because of the salary. I want to change my career and work in Web Development because when I visit a website I like it to be easy to read and be responsive no matter which device you use it on and have all sorts of features that make sense and fit together and are easy to use. I am passionate about technology, I like to read about the latest news in the tech industry.
